TempoDB Python API documentation¶

The tempodb-python library allows users of the Python language to connect to TempoDB’s REST-based API to read and write data to their databases. An introduction with examples can be found in the “examples and snippets” document below. The other pages document the functions and classes in the API itself.

Contents:

  • Examples and Snippets
    • Setting up a client
    • Creating a series
    • Modifying a series
    • Writing data
    • Reading data
  • Client API
  • HTTP Endpoint
  • Responses
  • Cursors
  • Domain Objects
  • Protocol Utilities
  • Datetime Utilities
